visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data with the series name 'Rainfall'. Additionally, specify custom colors for the chart and configure the chart's margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration object is designed to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9) with custom margins for better spacing. The title and axes labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, while the y-axis title indicates the unit of measurement (mm) for the rainfall data. The data series includes monthly rainfall values, with the series named 'Rainfall' and a custom color of blue (#0073e6). The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart.
